##README

Repository for the time series analysis of the tree stem radius variation data obtained from the dendrometers deployed in the Lanzhot site, south Czechia.
Time span is from Dec 2019 to Jun 2025. Frequency is hourly. Data is pre-cleaned in Mini32, the software for downloading the data.
